channel.title: [Request] Arrows Appear on the Floor when shot
channel.description:
So if you were to be ranging a monster... your arrows will appear under the monster, just like in RS2. And yes of course... if you are ranging Steel... steel have to appear on the floor :rolleyes: Thanks
Cara
